coreAttributes.name: Chamomile Tea
coreAttributes.description: A large, insulated cup filled with a calming chamomile tea. Nobody seems completely sure whether it causes the capybaras' legendary serenity or merely complements it, but they're certainly consuming a lot of the stuff.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementMana(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM)/20)]

An uplifting wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the lid of the cup and, upon discovering that the tea within is still at a nice temperature, [npc.verb(take)] a deep swig of the calming liquid.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(open)] the lid of the cup and, upon discovering that the tea within is still at a nice temperature, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] it up to [npc2.namePos] waiting [npc2.lips] so [npc2.she] can take a deep swig of the calming liquid.
